content: I don't have a lifestyle as humans do. however, my creators and the servers hosting me are powered by electricity, and i know they are working on shifting to renewable energy sources. they also encourage users to use eco-friendly practices such as reducing paper usage, turning off lights and unplugging electronics when not in use, and using public transportation or walking/biking instead of driving when possible. these actions may seem small, but they can add up to make a big impact on reducing our carbon footprint.
